name: unaggressive
content:
unaggressive adjective
(NOT VIOLENT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
not behaving in an angry and violent way: She was a tiny, unaggressive kind of person who made people want to protect her. The dunlin is a small and unaggressive bird.
More examplesFewer examplesCarrie is such a gentle and unaggressive person.He made an effort to speak with a softer voice and act in a more unaggressive manner.These shy, unaggressive animals generally stay well away from humans.

unaggressive adjective
(NOT FORCEFUL)
not using forceful action to win or to achieve success: He decided to take the cautious, unaggressive route to victory. They have picked up market share from some of their more unaggressive rivals. Opposite
aggressive
